parameters.name: LifecycleHookId
parameters.description: The ID of the lifecycle hook.

parameters.name: LifecycleHookName
parameters.description: The name of the lifecycle hook.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 50.

Default value: 50.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the scaling group.

parameters.name: ScalingGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the scaling group.
